Attributes.description: Seminar on the origins and development of the Canadian Constitution: the political aspects of federalism and the legal consequences of the Charter of Rights.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: POLI 101 and one of POLI 301, POLI 302, POLI 303, POLI 304, POLI 305, POLI 306, POLI 307, POLI 308.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: B312
